infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to enable live streaming and video recording features for content creation and sharing.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app uses the microphone to capture audio for live streams and video recordings.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to let you choose and update your profile picture.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app needs permission to save photos you take when updating your profile picture.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses your location to show nearby services and sellers in your area.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app uses your location to show nearby services and sellers in your area.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your camera to enable live streaming and video recording features.
plugins.microphonePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your microphone to capture audio for live streams and videos.

plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to use your location to show nearby services and sellers in your area.
